title: Site-wide: Fix critical architecture issues
Prompt Library: Add auto-save and unsaved-changes warning
description: Currently manual save only with no warning on close. Add debounced auto-save to localStorage and beforeunload warning for unsaved changes.

title: Prompt Library: Fix delete - add confirmation and undo
description: Delete is immediate with no undo or confirmation. Deleting all prompts leaves stale localStorage data that reloads on next visit.

title: Prompt Library: Fix sharing - URLs break past 2KB
description: Sharing base64-encodes entire prompts into URLs. Breaks at ~2048 chars. Need server-side share links or compressed encoding.

title: Agent Spec Builder: Decompose 927-line monolith
description: Main page.tsx is 927 lines handling everything. Break into focused components: SpecForm, SectionEditor, QualityMeter, EvalRubricBuilder, ExportPanel, PromptPacks, PresetGallery.

title: Agent Spec Builder: Add auto-save
description: No auto-save - users lose all work on page close. Add debounced localStorage auto-save with beforeunload warning.
close_reason: Completed: added debounced auto-save to localStorage, beforeunload warning, and Saving/Saved indicator

title: Agent Spec Builder: Fix broken Examples page
description: Renders in light mode, uses invalid Tailwind class rounded-none-lg, links point to root instead of /e/agent-spec-builder.
close_reason: Completed: fixed dark theme, removed invalid classes, fixed links, matched design system

title: The Blob: Visual and interaction polish
description: Creature behaviors too subtle, no audio, missing mobile touch fixes. Key upgrades: additive glow blending, ambient Web Audio, touch-action manipulation, devicePixelRatio handling.

title: The Blob: Add additive glow blending
description: Use globalCompositeOperation lighter for bioluminescence glow effect. Single biggest visual upgrade.

title: The Blob: Add ambient Web Audio
description: Generative ambient audio for soothing vibes. Significant immersion upgrade for an experience built around calm.

title: The Blob: Fix mobile touch issues
description: Missing touch-action: manipulation (causes double-tap zoom), user-select: none, devicePixelRatio handling, prefers-reduced-motion support.

title: Remove nested html/body tags from prompt-library and agent-spec-builder layouts
description: Both experiment sub-apps render their own html and body in nested layouts, breaking font/style inheritance from root layout. Replace with fragment or div wrappers. Delete their local globals.css files.

title: Site: Dynamic import heavy dependencies
description: Dynamically import react-markdown, remark-gfm, jszip - only load when needed. Saves ~100KB from initial bundles.

title: Site: Add accessibility foundations
description: color-scheme dark on html, skip-to-content link, focus-visible styles, aria-live on toasts/realtime, proper ARIA on dropdown menus. Replace alert/confirm with custom modals.

title: Site: Replace in-memory rate limiter for serverless
description: Current Map-based rate limiter wont survive serverless. Replace with Upstash Redis or Vercel KV before scaling.

title: Create shared useAuth hook/context
description: Auth state (getUser + onAuthStateChange) is copy-pasted across 5+ components. Extract to a useAuth() hook or AuthProvider context. Components: AuthButtons, AccountContent, Comments, CommentsHistoryPage, RegisterBotPage.
close_reason: Completed: extracted shared useAuth hook, refactored 5 components

title: Convert homepage to server component
description: Homepage is entirely use client rendering static data. Convert to server component with CSS animation delays instead of useState stagger. Tag filter can use searchParams or a small client island.

title: Remove unused p5 dependency
description: p5.js (~920KB) is a top-level dependency but the-blob uses raw Canvas 2D. Remove if unused, or dynamically import if needed elsewhere.

title: Delete stale AgentSpecBuilder.tsx duplicate and reconcile code
description: Two implementations exist: page.tsx (927 lines, current) and components/AgentSpecBuilder.tsx (570 lines, stale). Delete the stale version. Also two parallel lib directories. Clean up.

title: Prompt Library: Full rebuild
description: User says prompt library is bad. 938-line monolith, 16 useState hooks, zero decomposition, wrong fonts, data loss bugs, half-baked features. Needs complete restructuring.

title: Prompt Library: Decompose into components and hooks
description: Split 938-line monolith into ~7 focused components (PromptList, PromptEditor, PromptPreview, VariablePanel, VersionHistory, SearchBar, TemplateGallery) and 2+ custom hooks (usePromptStorage, usePromptState). This unblocks every other fix.
close_reason: Completed: decomposed 938-line prompt library monolith into components and hooks

title: Prompt Library: Fix design system - remove local layout.tsx and Geist fonts
description: Delete prompt-library/layout.tsx that renders its own html/body with Geist fonts. Let root layout handle fonts (Instrument Serif/DM Sans/JetBrains Mono). Remove ~50 hardcoded color values, use CSS variables.
